HelpMessage: The current commands are as follows:
!addrole [role name] - gives you the specified role.
!removerole [role name] - removes the specified role from you.
!listroles - sends a list of roles that can be added by _addrole.
__Note:__ You can refer to the bot by GlitchBot and receive a greeting. *(case sensitive)*
